contents: Contains the Home button on the left, and four buttons spread across the rest of the section.
On the left side of the screen, there are five vertically stacked buttons or menu items.
The main content area where 'Step 1' is written at the top, followed by a large placeholder (likely for an image or form). Below that are lines representing some additional content.
Contains a dropdown with the label 'Possible' and some content below it.
Contains a search bar on the left and some circular buttons below it. On the right, there is a section labeled 'Contact' with some lines representing text.
